wordpressPage.title: Alka-Seltzer On The Head Duel – Messy
wordpressPage.content:
You will need: Alka-seltzer tablets, water guns, rubber bands, water pistols

You may play this game as a quick up-front game or even as a 4-person tournament. 2 contestants, each armed with a
squirt gun, will take five paces and turn to duel. On each of their foreheads, you will have attached an Alka-seltzer tablet
with double stick tape (possibly use big rubber bands if tape doesnâ€™t work). They draw and shoot the water at each other,
the first one to dissolve the tablet on the other’s forehead wins. Use swim goggles for each to protect their eyes. The
tablet will fizz and foam all over the place
